    public class GewtMaterialTextArea
extends gwt.material.design.client.ui.MaterialTextArea
implements de.esoco.ewt.component.TextArea.IsTextArea, de.esoco.ewt.property.ImageAttribute
    A MaterialTextArea subclass that also implements the interface TextArea.IsTextArea.
